title: More Like LIB Cheney! Psychics THRIVING In Pandemic! 7.2.21
itunes:title: More Like LIB Cheney! Psychics THRIVING In Pandemic! 7.2.21
description:
In episode 943, Jack and Miles are joined by Sparkleside Chats with Magical Girl Ayu host's Ayumi Shinozaki to discuss Republicans threatening January 6th commission committee members, cops avoiding being filmed by playing pop music, the Pacific Northwest's disastrous heatwave, why business for psychics is booming during the pandemic, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pelosi names Liz Cheney to serve on Jan. 6 select committee
  2. McCarthy Threatens Committee Assignments Of Members Who Take Jan. 6 Committee Seat From Pelosi
  3. Justice for Steven Taylor: What’s happening in San Leandro?
  4. Cop Plays Taylor Swift to Prevent Video Sharing of Him Harassing Protesters 
  5. The Pacific Northwest’s Punishing Heatwave Has Killed Dozens
  6. Why business is booming for psychics during the pandemic
  7. What, if Anything, Can Psychics Tell Us About All of This?
  8. Talking to the Dead: How the 1918 Pandemic Spurred a Spiritualism Craze
  9. Coronavirus is bringing a plague of dangerous doomsday predictions
  10. No, a self-proclaimed psychic did not predict coronavirus
  11. Psychic Scams Rise During COVID-19 Pandemic
  12. Psychics Are Raking in the Dough During the Pandemic
  13. Key players charged in $200 million psychic mail fraud case
  14. WHEN IS FORTUNE-TELLING A CRIME?
  15. LISTEN: CHAI - Donuts Mind If I Do - Official Music Video

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
